014package org.microbean.bean;
015
016import java.util.Objects;
017
018public abstract class AbstractFactory<I> implements Factory<I> {
019
020  private final InterceptionsApplicator<I> interceptionsApplicator;
021
022  private final Initializer<I> initializer;
023
024  private final Producer<I> producer;
025
026  private final boolean destroys;
027
028  private final Destructor<I> destructor;
029
030  protected AbstractFactory(final Producer<I> producer) {
031    this(null, null, producer, null);
032  }
033
034  protected AbstractFactory(final Producer<I> producer, final Destructor<I> destructor) {
035    this(null, null, producer, destructor);
036  }
037
038  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
039  protected AbstractFactory(final InterceptionsApplicator<I> interceptionsApplicator, // applies business method interceptions
040                            final Initializer<I> initializer, // calls initializer methods and post-initialize methods
041                            final Producer<I> producer, // handles production, including possibly intercepted production
042                            final Destructor<I> destructor) { // calls pre-destroy methods and handles destruction
043    super();
044    this.interceptionsApplicator = interceptionsApplicator == null ? AbstractFactory::noopIntercept : interceptionsApplicator;
045    this.initializer = initializer == null ? (NoOpInitializer<I>)NoOpInitializer.INSTANCE : initializer;
046    this.producer = Objects.requireNonNull(producer);
047    if (destructor == null) {
048      this.destroys = false;
049      this.destructor = new Destructor<I>(); // this destructor is basically a no-op
050    } else {
051      this.destroys = true;
052      this.destructor = destructor;
053    }
054  }
055
056  @Override // Factory<I>
057  public I create(final Creation<I> c, final ReferenceSelector r) {
058    // Produce the product, initialize the product, apply business method interceptions to the product, return the
059    // product
060    return this.interceptionsApplicator.apply(this.initializer.initialize(this.producer.produce(c, r), c, r), c, r);
061  }
062
063  @Override // Factory<I>
064  public boolean destroys() {
065    return this.destroys;
066  }
067
068  // MUST be idempotent
069  @Override // Factory<I>
070  @SuppressWarnings("try")
071  public void destroy(final I i, final AutoCloseable destructionRegistry, final ReferenceSelector references) {
072    this.destructor.destroy(i, destructionRegistry, references);
073  }
074
075  private static final <I> I noopIntercept(final I i, final Creation<I> c, final ReferenceSelector r) {
076    return i;
077  }
078
079  private static final class NoOpInitializer<I> extends Initializer<I> {
080
081    private static final NoOpInitializer<?> INSTANCE = new NoOpInitializer<>();
082
083    private NoOpInitializer() {
084      super();
085    }
086
087    @Override
088    protected final I performInitialization(final I i, final Creation<I> c, final ReferenceSelector r) {
089      return i;
090    }
091
092  }
093
094}
